title: Medici Coat of Arts with Figures from Callot
description: various small sketches on sheet; round coat of arms medallion with acanthus leaves surrounding small irregularly-shaped shield mounted with a helmet of armor and a small scroll with text at top, at right center of sheet; sketch of helmet of armor in LLC; small sketches of figures in various poses overall, including scene of flogging at left center and soldiers with flags and spears
